DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion subject upper motor neuron lesion 10th thoracic 7th cervical spinal level . The completeness injury verify somatosensory evoked potential . Subjects exclude pressure ulcer chronic infection lower extremity muscle contracture deep vein thrombosis recent limb fracture muscle metabolic disorder comorbid disease know affect bone metabolism ( parathyroid dysfunction ) pregnant plan become pregnant . Subjects distal femur trabecular bone mineral density le 50 mg/cm3 exclude participation quadriceps electrical stimulation training
